content: saxon braid shawl copyright 2023 by karen bradley materials 3 skeins bfl dk superwash by keenan hand dyed yarn in driftwood 100%bluefaced leiscester wool 246yds/100g us #7 circular needles 32 inches us #6 double pointed needle or any other us #6 needle this is used to work the garter st border along the top gauge 19 sts and 36 row in garter st for 4 x 4 inches cable needle markers stitches used k knit p purl kfb knit front & back knit into the front then into the back of the st m1 or m1l make one lift the horizontal bar between the st just worked and the next st from the front and knit into the back of the bar increase st s1 slip one knitwise with the yarn in back p2tog purl 2 together pm place marker sm slip marker 2/1 rpc slip 1 st to cable needle hold in back k2 p1 from the cable needle 2/1 lpc slip 2 sts to cable needle hold in front p1 k2 from the cable needle 2/2 rc slip 2 sts to cable needle hold in back k2 k2 from the cable needle 2/2 rpc slip 2 sts to cable needle hold in back k2 p2 from the cable needle 2/2 lc slip 2 sts to cable needle hold in front k2 k2 from the cable needle 2/2 lpc slip 2 sts to cable needle hold in front p2 k2 from the cable needle w & t bring yarn to the front slip the next st from the lh needle to the rh needle as if to knit bring the yarn to the back of the work slip the st on the rh needle back to the lh needle turn the work and begin the next row ssk slip slip knit s2 k1 psso slip 2 sts together as if to knit k the next st pass the 2 slipped sts over the knit st pattern notes and hints 1 this pattern is designed to be knit from the narrow end to the wide end in order to allow the knitter to choose the size to make it 2 after the 6 set up row this shawl increases by 1 stitch on every right side row that increase is always located right before the last 3 stitches of every right side row 3 the pattern uses only 1x2 or 2x2 cables and for those who are comfortable can easily be made without a cable needle 4 the two columns of lacework are always yo p2tog on both the rs and ws of the work and are always worked over the same 2 sts 5 the written directions as given are for the full chart and should not be used when working the increases within the cable pattern 6 when adding the stitch at the end of the rs row over the cable pattern if the additional st occurs in the same place as a cable occurs ignore the cable
